University of Mainz: The Johannes Gutenberg University Mainz (German: Johannes Gutenberg-Universit√§t Mainz) is a public research university in Mainz, Rhineland Palatinate, Germany. It is named after the printer Johannes Gutenberg since 1946. As of 2018,[update] it had approximately 32,000 students enrolled in around 100 academic programs. The university is organized into 11 faculties.
